column4: hiya, any advice on where to put a partition that will be a music folder, other than /home
why not /home?
/media is good
i have home for downloads and temp tv shows and photo's
i was thinking /mnt or /opt  those alright?
your /home should be all of *your* stuff, which essentially includes Music, but it's up to you. You can mount it on a subdirectory of /home, but it's completely up to you. You could use /media
either are fine; /mnt is more Mandrake style though ;)
i already put a mount on /home, perhaps i should have made that partion super big instead of making three partitions.  dang.
You should, ideally, have three in all: /, /home and /swap
you can still mount something as a subdirectory of /home
i.e. /home/music
*swap, no / ;)
i see; also, the partition i want to move, is located on /temp, will that break anything if i move it?
nope, just change the mount point.
ok, thanks, here goes, i think i will try and make a sub partitoin like u suggested
i was going to use the ubuntu install disk to do this, then quit after re- partitioning, is this the easiest way?
